name: Update NBP API Project
description: Add user login and registration, and process data from the NBP API.

description: Discuss the basics and applications of React Native in mobile apps for iOS and Android.

name: Team Project Review
description: Review current progress in the team project 'Team Project' and next steps.

name: Complete Modal in `AmountList`
description: Refine display of item details in the `AmountList` modal and add descriptions.

description: Investigate the advantages of using TypeScript in an Express-based backend and prepare a demo.

name: Review Project Fonts
description: Upload TTF files to the project and test selected fonts across different components.

name: Master Asynchronous JavaScript
description: Understand async programming, Promises, and async/await for better code management.

name: Prepare Test Report
description: Prepare a report based on tests conducted in the NBP API project.

name: Check SEO Settings for Application
description: Review and optimize SEO settings for the application built in React.
